text.title: ABC Islands
text.head: ABC Islands
text.p: There are (at least) two sets of ABC Islands:
In the Leeward Antilles, the southerly islands of the Lesser Antilles:

list.item: Aruba - an autonomous dependency of the Kingdom of the Netherlands
Bonaire - a "special municipality" of the Netherlands
Curacao (Cura√ßao) - an autonomous dependency of the Kingdom of the Netherlands

text.p: In the Alexander Archipelago, in Southeastern Alaska:

list.item: Baranof (also Baranov or Sitka) Island - largest city: Sitka
